name: Seti's Last Journey
description:
Some say that life’s challenges resurface in the afterlife.

Traverse the afterlife as the spirit of a dead Pharaoh to reach the realm of Anubis.

Credits

A game by Nitai Heeb (OrangeJam) & Nils Wallenfang (nilolo).

3D Assets by Niels Asselborn & Nitai Heeb.

Anubis Statue by Stefan Horrmann.

Music & Sound Design by Thimras.

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam 42.

The source code is available on Github!
